Forest problems

Climate Change and Forests

Climate change is accelerating forest degradation, altering growth patterns, and increasing the risk of fires, pests, and diseases. These changes affect the ecosystem and the people who depend on forests for their livelihoods.

Conservation Efforts Worldwide

Deforestation and Its Impact

Forests play a critical role in sustaining life on Earth.
